content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for your interest in my apartment, Ms. Müller. I'm happy to discuss the rental price with you. Based on the size of the apartment and the current market rates, I was thinking of renting it for 800 euros per month. What do you think?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am willing to pay 750 euros per month for the apartment. Can we agree on that price?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I appreciate your offer, Ms. Müller. However, I would like to clarify that the apartment is 25 square meters in size and I am looking for a rental price that reflects its value in the current market. Based on my research, I believe that the market rate for a 25 square meter apartment in this area is around 800 euros per month. I would be willing to consider a rental price of 750 euros per month, but I would need to see some additional information or justification for that price. Is there anything else you can provide that would help me make a decision?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I understand your concerns. I am willing to provide additional information to justify the rental price. What type of information would you like to see?

I am a student and I am willing to sign a long-term lease agreement with you. I also have a good credit history and I am willing to pay the rent on time every month. I am also very responsible and dependable, so I am confident that I will take good care of the apartment. I am also willing to sign a pet agreement if you allow pets in the apartment. I hope this information helps you understand my situation better.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for providing that additional information, Ms. Müller. I appreciate your willingness to sign a long-term lease agreement and your good credit history, as well as your responsibility and dependability. I also appreciate your willingness to sign a pet agreement if necessary. Based on all of this information, I am willing to accept your rental price of 750 euros per month for the apartment. I agree to the price of 750 euros per month.
name: Heinrich Heine
